document_data.name: Coram Wheelarit
document_data.mainbody: Master '''Coram Wheelarit''' was a [[human]] of the [[Wheelarit]] family of [[Amnwater]], [[Amn]].
document_data.History: As of [[1368 DR]], he had incurred debts to [[Jhanos Yhliivast]] as a result of gambling at the [[Gilded Spur]].
